website_summaries.verdict: A durable, portable manicure table that is great for travel or for any manicurist looking for a practical model at a reasonable price.
pros: With four rolling wheels, this table is perfect for transport
Easily folds, making it great for small spaces
Wrist cushion is comfortable and thick
Vented surface with a fan helps pull dust downward
cons: Some customers received tables that were dented or scratched

customer_reviews.title: No protective finish
customer_reviews.text: There is no protective coating on this table... Any of your nail liquids will destroy it. I got it today, unboxed it, it’s easy to assemble, but look at the discoloration/ruined finish after just 1 client!! I’m really disappointed in this.. it would be perfect if u had a protective finish on top
customer_reviews.author: Allie V

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I’m so in love with this table😍 it’s the perfect size for my apartment 🤗 it came in 2 days also love the bag perfect when I’m on the go👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Trust the picture not the video it shows
customer_reviews.text: I’m in love with my table yasss! Took a minute but I got it. 😁😁😁
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Crawford

customer_reviews.title: No assembly needed but smaller than pictured.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy that the desk came assembled! That was an amazing suprise! I thought I was going to have to put it together myself. The desk is a bit smaller than I thought it would be. As a nail technician, we tend to need alot of things on the desk for each appointment including a nail lamp, overhead lighting lamp, nail products like gel, acrylic, implements and tools at the least. However I make it work and it will do for now. I like that is has wheels and it's portable for those of us who do mobile services as well. It's very easy to fold and unfold and packs well in small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Nail Tech

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying, a good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely 💯 like this table, can't say enough about it.. it's sturdy, the right size (not too small or too big) the finish is good 👍 and the wheels can be keep locked or unlocked when I need to move it. Perfect for mobile services for manicurist and or anyone who needs to have a table to create a manicure. The length, width and thickness are 💯❤😃👍
customer_reviews.author: Petty Noona

customer_reviews.title: Exactly how the picture looks
customer_reviews.text: Packed extremely well for shipping. Double box. No scratches or dings...otherwise seems fairly sturdy. I just wish the Jordan slide all the way out the other side. Needs a stopper or something.
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Brown

customer_reviews.title: Too small and unstable
customer_reviews.text: This table is shakey and unstable. It’s very tiny and small almost like it was made for a child!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Mant

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Better off buying a real nail desk. This is great for portable use thought.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Greatness
customer_reviews.text: Amazing nail desk! Easy to set up and use! I love how I’m able to fold it up and put in the travel bag and use it on the go! Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Wendykatalina

customer_reviews.title: Love compact and very practical
customer_reviews.text: Love this compact table, it’s much better than I thought!! Would recommend, price is great
customer_reviews.author: Carmen L.

customer_reviews.title: Customer satisfaction and pruduct quality
customer_reviews.text: The nail table isnt worth the money it cost its design and materials are a poor grade i will never buy anything from tbis company
customer_reviews.author: Wendy smith

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: The legs keep wanting to close on it. Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annn, keep lookin this isn't it!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not have dust vent or pattern print and legs do not lock in place very well
customer_reviews.author: Tiona Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty small
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table but it’s very tiny. You have to have shorter chairs to be able to fit under the table. Not much room on the table. Would be better if it was wider. But very handy when traveling
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never order from them again!
customer_reviews.text: The table is great. But sadly it took over 2 months to have it delivered. I will never order from this place again. I should have read the reviews first but it was an investment for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: La Familia

customer_reviews.title: In functional drawer(it sucks)
customer_reviews.text: Nice table ... I just wish that the drawer would have a stopper be cause it slides out and everything falls out with it
customer_reviews.author: Kizzy

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy desk perfect for on the go artist. Very pretty and professional look.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina S Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: The desk is a lot thicker and more durable than I expected. It’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco mena

customer_reviews.title: Noooooo
customer_reviews.text: too small and short returning now please return money please
customer_reviews.author: Nancy c.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: it came so fast !! and also it came with lots of protection !! loved loved loved this product so sturdy and great quality
customer_reviews.author: Patricia rosas

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED
customer_reviews.text: photo advertised as a larger desk - small for kids
customer_reviews.author: David Fontanes

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much now I can finally do nails.
customer_reviews.author: Katira N. Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Revamped
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this table because I do my acrylics myself and I needed somewhere to actually sit in do them without messing up my vanity. Of course I don't like anything plane so I marbled my table and Decided to bring it out And add my logo came out very nicely I haven't used it yet but I'll be using it this evening. I wish I had space to actually leave it set up so that I can keep everything in its drawer. That's setting it up in storing it is no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable/Starter Desk
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this cute, sturdy, little desk. I am not a professional, but I enjoy doing my own nails and some of my family and friends’ nails. It came as described: already assembled, lockable wheels and has a great carrying case. It’s a great size and meets all of my needs. I have only one complaint: when you set it up, the legs do not have a clip to lock them in place. So, if you have to move the desk, the legs will sometimes collapse on you. Other than that one issue, I am quite happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KnaTasha Rose

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent Manicure Table!
customer_reviews.text: This manicure table is awesome! It’s exactly as described. The table; especially the table top and legs, are built well. The hand/wrist rest appears to be durable, functional and comfortable. The carrying case is light weight, but made with durable material. I especially like how the zippers are multi-directional and go beyond the length of the case to make it easier to put the table inside.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for at home
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for at home nails the only thing I don’t like is the drawer can be opened on both sides and it doesn’t have a stopping point so could fall out
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

product_meta.title: Manicure Nail Table -SUNCOO Nail Station Portable Manicure Desk Foldable Nail Tech table Spa Beauty Salon with Rolling Wheels,Carry bag,Drawer,Sponge Wrist Cushion
feature_bullets: MATERIAL CERTIFICATION-These manicure tables have been certified by CARB II,they are built to last, with MDF material and acetone proof laminate finished, these nail tables will last you years of use and abuse.

SMALL AND EXQUISITE-Are you a traveling nail technician? Try our manicure table, weighting in at less than 20 pounds and fold down to about 14 inches, this table is perfect for those who do house calls, or just working at home to have it stored away neatly.
LARGE STORAGE - Our nail table has a large drawer with enough storage space, which allows you to put many of your cosmetics or nail polish in it without occupying the area on your desk.
TRIANGLE SUPPORT -The leg and the top of the table are fixed with a triangle rule bracket,making the table more solid that you don't worry about table shaking during nail beauty.
LOVELY PRESENT : It's not very heavy and easy to carry.It will be your beloved woman's favorite gift, give her a chance to be beautiful.
